alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Newton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 12:01AM CST until February 22 at 12:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Johnson County in western Arkansas... Southwestern Newton County in north central Arkansas... * Until 1245 AM CST. * At 1201 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cass, or 8 miles north of Ozark, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Salus... Catalpa... Harmony... Friley... Yale... Ozone... Fallsville... Oark... Hunt... Wolf Pen Campground... Arbaugh... Hillcrest in Johnson County... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for western and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for western and north central Arkansas.
